overview.en: Croc is Croc  global ecological certificate,and it is the highest interest of  the Croc platform,which total price is 100 billion and $0.00144 / pieces. When you hold a Croc stock you can  deeply involve in Croc  platform for its future development. Meanwhile,the user can distribute mining exchanges and get tasks for mining rights,share Croc  the value of growth through participating in the trading platform. And there are 60% of them in the platform,equally about 60 billions,which are issued in the form of the mining transactions. Meanwhile,there are 5% of them in the platform,about 5 billions which are issued by mining tasks.8%,8 billions,strategic partners. When there is a team,Team is 17% (17 billion) (locked up for three years). (Croc Fund) Fund is 10%,10 billions,for platform operation and promotion,and is used for user security Fund,etc.
overview.zh: Croc是Croc(鳄鱼)全球生态通证,Croc(鳄鱼)平台的最高权益证明,总量1000亿,发行价格0.00144美金/枚,持有Croc可深度参与Croc（鳄鱼）平台的未来发展,用户可通过参与平台交易挖矿和任务挖矿获得权益派发,分享Croc（鳄鱼）的价值增长。其中60%,600亿是通过交易挖矿形式发行,5%,50亿通过做任务挖矿发行；?8% ,80亿,战略伙伴。团队17%（170亿）（锁仓三年）,（Croc?Fund）基金10%,100亿,用于平台运营推广,用户资金安全保障基金等等。
